website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for beginners –this set includes three needles and a downloadable electronic instruction manual that walks you through the entire marinating process.
pros: Food-safe 304 grade stainless steel used in all food contact parts
cons: Plunger is stiff, may need lubrication
Marinade needle creates large holes in meat
Replacement O-rings may or may not be included in package

website_summaries.verdict: Made entirely of stainless steel, this kit is high quality, includes more accessories than other sets, and works with different types of marinades and meats. It may cost a little more, but you'll get everything you need in this set.
pros: Features three different needles, one for liquid marinades, one for minced marinades, and one for smaller cuts of meat
Also includes extra silicone o-rings, cleaning brushes, and a free e-book with directions and recipes
cons: This set is a little pricier than others on the market, but you'll get a quality kit from a company with great customer service

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Two big issues- one is that filling the injector when using the liquid multiple hole needle is not quick/easy/ is very messy. Second- it broke after just a few uses. Not happy with that at all as I teach cooking classes and the products I use are often then purchased by my students. Update: This company has fantastic customer service and replaced the injector and were incredibly kind and professional. I'm very impressed and appreciative.
customer_reviews.author: rookiemama

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Forget the cheap plastic junk you find at the stores. This thing is the real thing: all metal with o-rings to keep everything sealed up. Also, they include plenty of extra o-rings for when the originals wear out. The whole device is very heavy duty and feels solid enough to last a long time. I injected several pieces of chicken and pork in preparation for smoking and the needles were nice and sharp and the fluid flowed easily, not problems at all. The case is cardboard, but it has nice cut-outs to keep everything organized. The cleaning brushes are also a nice touch. Overall I am very impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Last one I will EVER buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these devices. They always fail at the least opportune moment. This year as Thanksgiving was looming ahead I remembered that my flavor injector had broke last year. I found this and thought it was a little pricey. The injector is very robust & sturdy. Works great! Even to inject a turkey with Italian salad dressing before frying. This one will last the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A Leeper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as the Product is Named
customer_reviews.text: I love this injector. So far I've used it on my hamburgers and hot dogs (weird, I know). But if you put a little bourbon marinade in the hamburger and some Worcestershire sauce in the hot dogs they taste really good. I'm planning on putting some marinade in chicken too. The options are endless with this. It's very sturdy and it comes with the all of the needed attachments and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Topher B

customer_reviews.title: ... really an experienced injector user but I made a wonderful pulled pork shoulder with a mojo marinade utilizing this ...
customer_reviews.text: Not really an experienced injector user but I made a wonderful pulled pork shoulder with a mojo marinade utilizing this made a notable difference in the way the meat turned out. Quality & sturdy build if you remember to spray a light spritz of olive oil or some other lubricant into the cavity before using I found no problems at all with the pressure required to push in the plunger. Comes with a nice case to keep the product in between uses which should minimize any potential accidental nicks and bends.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Premiala flavor injector
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality of the injector, it's a very serious piece of machinery . I believe this one has what it takes to last a lifetime." I used it today to inject a turkey breast, and it handled the marinade so smoothly, there was little to no effort required pushing the plunger. Premiala is a small family owned company that truly has customer happiness at their core. Make sure to read the "e-booklet" for proper cleaning and oiling prior to use, and you can't go wrong. If you are shopping around for a flavor injector, you've just found the best.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene E. Works

customer_reviews.title: The best meat injector at any price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the real deal! Just by the heft of it you can tell it will last forever in home use. I was able to quickly clean and assemble the injector and start injecting within minutes. The brisket I injected was hands down the best brisket I ever had. The GM Greg followed up about a week after the purchase and I was thinking "computer generated email". I responded to the email with a little humor and he emailed me back within a couple of hours. Don't even think about buying a cheaper or more expensive injector. This is the one you are looking for! Sean
customer_reviews.author: Sean McKeon

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty injector
customer_reviews.text: Can be somewhat difficult to keep liquid in the larger needles (especially with side holes) between the bowl and the meet. Cleaning can be tedious. Overall the product is well constructed and gets the job done. Protip: If you're buying this to inject brisket with, save your money, only buy USDA prime meat, thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: piggy40285

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy , easy to use , no clogging
customer_reviews.text: Great product , used it 3xs the very first week . Very well made but most impressive was the way it handled marinades that were a little thicker and contained herbs , absolutely no clogging. Very sturdy also plus easy to clean. I have a culinary degree and do not easily impress but this works very well. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Scala

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several injectors in the past and threw them away. Finally got this one and it is amazing. So easy to use, Easy to clean, Needles for all possible uses. And works better than I even hoped. Nice solid feel to it as it's stainless steel. I think this will last me a lifetime. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Injector!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item when my cheap one broke and I could not be happier with it! I used it on some chickens that we were grilling and it worked perfectly. The injector was easy to operate one handed to inject the meat while holding it with the other hand. I can see a lot of use coming from this injector!
customer_reviews.author: Sivart

customer_reviews.title: good for competitions
customer_reviews.text: although you have to refill the chamber this is a great sturdy unit. I've only used it once on pork tenderloin but the cook and end product was flawless. I have had several injectors from the cheap plastic freebees to the more expensive auto fills and I believe I can be confident with this injector as I cruise the countryside doing competitions.
customer_reviews.author: Brad F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Injector
customer_reviews.text: There is no comparison between this injector and those plastic syringe injectors. I don't know why I didn't purchase this one in the first place. This injector is so well built, it should last a life time. It is so much easier to inject the meat and the results are great. Used to smoke 4 chicken halves and everyone couldn't get over how moist and tender the breasts were. Great product, so glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bruno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Injector
customer_reviews.text: A superb tool for the kitchen or grill and an absolute necessity for the turkey fryer! The Premiala was more expensive than the plastic injectors but I splurged because I only wanted to buy it once. The injector is quite stout and comes with additional needles and spare o-rings packaged neatly in foam so you won't lose the pieces. We gave it a workout with a couple of turkeys this Christmas and it worked flawlessly. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Regular Guy

customer_reviews.title: The amount of holes and diameter of the needles apply to different kinds of Meat or Chicken - the amount of penetration of my so
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb instrument. I have used a few injectors with little quality success. The Premiala Meat injector is about 10 levels higher in quality, precision and ease of use. The sets of needles are very convenient and allow for a very accurate injections into various meats. The amount of holes and diameter of the needles apply to different kinds of Meat or Chicken - the amount of penetration of my solutions is excellent. I would recomend Premiala Injectors to anyone enamored with precision and quality.
customer_reviews.author: N. WEST

customer_reviews.title: A Beast
customer_reviews.text: This injector is very well made and very sturdy. If meat injectors were something you gifted down to your kids then this product would be at the top of the list LOL! I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone. Considering buying more for my family and some coworkers who grill, they think they're content with those lame plastic injectors, I should show them what a difference this item makes in their lives!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Meat Injector INDEED!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Small issue with shipping, but due to a third party carrier and no fault of the seller. The seller was quite helpful!! After amazon gave me a refund, I reordered and arrived the next day! Plus I got fee shipping thanks to amazon when taking care of the issue!! :) Meat injector is extremely top notch and can't wait to try it. This thing is so heavy duty, it's just amazing how well built this injector is.:)
customer_reviews.author: John Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: High quality, lots of options, spare parts...great choice here!
customer_reviews.text: This is of the upmost quality that I have seen and it not only comes with optional needles, it also comes with cleaning brushes and spare parts to replace the o-rings and seals. The tips and suggested injection ideas was also helpful to learn your choices of using different mixtures that you may have around the house or work for your family.
customer_reviews.author: PBota

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product a few months ago after reading many postive reviews about its effectiveness. When the injector arrived I was disappointed to find that the large needles would not screw on properly to the barrel. I emailed Greg from Premiala who was very communicative and willing to try to figure out what the issue was. Rather than seek a return, Greg was kind enough to have a replacement sent, free of charge. Since using the injector multiple times I can honestly say that I am 100% satisfied with the ways turned out, regardless of the initial issues. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: No E-book
customer_reviews.text: Decent product but the download for the "free" e-book doesn't work. A number of customers have complained about this issue on the download page, but Primiala still hasn't fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ken From KC

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN EXPECTED!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality and value of this product, much nicer than I anticipated, and with three needles and spare o-rings, a very good deal compared to the nickel-plated brass version I purchased a couple of years ago from a well known hunting and fishing outfitter, for just a little bit less. I can't see how this product could be improved, and I have to say, seller's interest in customer satisfaction is second to none! Top notch!
customer_reviews.author: piplcom

customer_reviews.title: Love this Injector!
customer_reviews.text: Updating previous review: This is the best injector I have used. The e-book is very helpful. The act that extra "o" rings are included is a tribute to the quality of the product and the attention to detail the company provides. I can also attest to the customer service of this company - absolutely outstanding! If you are looking for a great injector and information to help you, this is the product for you!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this injector after looking at the reviews, so far it has lived up to my expectations. I got the optional nylon carry case to go along with this injector and it give a place to hold all the pieces. Comes with everything you need to clean it and I am super happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Smokers out there
customer_reviews.text: This little set is at a nice price point and I was surprised at the quality of the machining of the parts. I'd recommend it for anyone starting out in the smoking hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Z

customer_reviews.title: I'm really "into" it now
customer_reviews.text: My slow-cooker "BBQ" pulled pork used to be great. Now it's getting raves from family and friends. I didn't change the ingredients. I changed the way I got those ingredients into the meat: my new meat injector. Made the ordinary good ingredients seem somehow "secret" and "special" just by getting them into the meat instead of just rubbed onto the surface. Very happy diners on the results. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product that gives you multiple options for injection and even gives you spare O rings. They even emailed an instruction booklet with some sample recipes to get you started. It's durable. I'm new at smoking meats and this set will help me take it to another level.
customer_reviews.author: dzfromny

customer_reviews.title: Super well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product at a very good price point. Excellent piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I had a big turkey for Thanksgiving this year and I was nervous about drying it out, I looked at the reviews of this meat injector and bought it, although I had some fun pumping a mixture chicken stock and butter into the turkey, it was delicious. The injector is made well and I didn't have to worry if it was going to do the job, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Injector
customer_reviews.text: Item is as described. I received the e-book email immediately after purchasing. I have only used the item once and it worked as expected. I followed the instructions for making a fill bottle out of a modified water bottle. I am very pleased with this product and would recommend it. I feel like the additional needle and replacement gaskets make this a good value over other similar injectors.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Looks good... well built and heavy stainless steel but I haven’t tried it yet... If it works good ... and I believe it will... I’ll add another star...
customer_reviews.author: Richie K

customer_reviews.title: great instructions, excellent email followup with e-book download
customer_reviews.text: Solidly made, great instructions, excellent email followup with e-book download, complete kit - highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Turkey
customer_reviews.text: The injectors worked great and the Bird turned out Tasty and Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Chaser1

customer_reviews.title: The e-book is a nice, quick education on marinades and using the tool
customer_reviews.text: The Premiala food injector is a quality item. The e-book is a nice, quick education on marinades and using the tool. The customer service has been among the best I have experienced and the injector works very well. I used it this past easter and it was so much easier to use than my tipped baster. I can wait to try it on filling cup cakes.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny P

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The thing is amazing for Turkey's brisket ribs anything you can think of that you want to inject
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kotara

customer_reviews.title: Quality injector
customer_reviews.text: Quality meat injector easy to use great price and fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: lumpy joe

customer_reviews.title: EEE - Everything Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: The injector is very well priced for the money. I was surprised at the extreme high quality. Premiala has been great. They emailed instructions before the package arrived so I can get familiar with the injector. The injector arrived on time and I've gotten follow-up emails from Proemial regarding my purchase. Even the packaging was high quality (very suitable to use as a gift). Also, I am now a convert from brining to injecting. In preparation for T'giving, I've butter balled 2 turkey breasts for practice. WOW!
customer_reviews.author: KFM6

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I finally used my injector on July 4th and it worked great. I wanted an injector that was more durable than the standard plastic syringes. This injector seems to be very substantial. I also like the fact that it is all stainless on the food contact surfaces. The three different needles are great for all different size meats. I like that I have the option on a needle with outlets at the tip only or multiple holes going up the needle. I would definitely buy this injector if I had to do it over.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Injector and ebook only, no spices.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product once so far. It appears to be sturdy, high quality. Do not worry about difficulty in getting the recipe book. The seller will immediately email it to you in PDF format. I received the ebook within 24 hours of my order. I would have given 5 stars but the title description leads you to believe there are spices included in the order.
customer_reviews.author: Ipodcrazy

customer_reviews.title: The best one I have found
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Well-made, solid construction. Much prefer this to plastic versions. Comes in sturdy and reusable storage box (points for eco-friendly packaging), and has a quite useful recipe book. Would be a good gift to someone who loves to cook.
customer_reviews.author: unmecexploré

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s built extremely sturdy. I’ve injected several cuts of meat and not a single issue. The storage box is a nice touch and cleaning is a cinch. I’d definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey M.

customer_reviews.title: Best injector I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best injector I have ever used. I have used them for over twenty years and have tossed a lot of them away, as they kept breaking. This one will be used forever really well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DAJ

customer_reviews.title: This item is all that it is described to be ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is all that it is described to be and some more. This item works wonders and by my opinion it is well worth buying I will buy this item again as a gift for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Karl L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Meat Injector
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, especially the mini cleaning brushes for the needles. The different needle sizes make injecting anything super easy. Quit wasting your money on those plastic ones at Wally world and get this thing, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: Tastiest! Juiciest! Most Interesting Flavors Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The awesome meat injector is the best! I would appreciate a book about the injector mailed to me.This purchase was a gift. I already own a meat injector and I love it. Thank You Carol Saefke 15538 Park Terrace Drive Eden Prairie, MN 55346
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Saefke

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This Cajun loves to cook, and I'm loving the tough design and utility of this metal injector system after going through multiple plastic units. Works, extremely well documented, and built to last. Nice having replacement parts available.
customer_reviews.author: Karlac

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Hints
customer_reviews.text: I got my flavor injector August of 2015. So far it has never failed me. One trick I would like to pass on when using fresh or dry herbs, fresh garlic, etc. in your marinade, is to make it small enough to pass through the needle. Most people's knife skills(including mine) are not that good. I like to use a mini chopper or an immersion blender to process the marinade. Or you can use a commercially made marinade.
customer_reviews.author: JACK ZINDORF

customer_reviews.title: ... have used the injector several times and it works excellent. This injector is made with quality material which ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used the injector several times and it works excellent. This injector is made with quality material which I do not see much anymore. After I purchased the injector the company emailed me with detailed instructions on how to best use the injector. This type of customer service is almost unheard of anymore. It is nice to know that there are still companies that make high quality merchandise and care about their customers. If you want a high quality injector I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: it does okay
customer_reviews.text: It okay .I spend more time cleaning than using. You need to chop all ingredients very fine to pass through without clogging. if you used a bigger needle it doesn't always go where planned.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pieri

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It has a tight seal and isn't flimsy like the cheap plastic one. The needles stay on without coming off unlike the plastic model too. I also like the large holes as the rubs I use are home made and have spices in the liquid that clog up small needle holes. Overall I'd say this is one terrific buy and product. Also feel good know I have extra seals should the current ones crack or get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Was using those plastic injectors and this blows them out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: To use with poultry,brought as a gift they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the plastic injectors.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time tonight, the stainless steel design makes it almost destructible, I broke 2 other plastic ones on first time use before using this one. It’s smooth and easy to clean, comes with a few different needles. Highly suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this solely for the purpose of injecting beef brisket for smoking on my WSM. Cheap plastic but it gets the job done. The needle does not leave a large hole and that was what I was looking for. Wish the exit hole was further down closer to the tip but it will just be a matter of getting used to it. It works better than some twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and works Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for competition BBQ and it works great. Built like a tank!! Blows away the cheaper plastic injectors.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Prattini

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Smoked a turkey breast, whole turkey, easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pearl

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful piece of hardware
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of hardware, and performs just as well. The plunger seal is absolutely leakproof. And the injector needles are perfect in their intended purposes. It takes a little getting used to the right techniques so that you don't make a mess like I did the first time. But you quickly learn. An outstanding tool that I expect will last many years - well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne_M

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made with extra O-rings.
customer_reviews.text: I received an email from the company 2 hours after I placed the order telling me thanks and if I had had questions where to email. The product has the largest injector tube for more liquid than any of the other ones I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Rustic Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, well built! Good Price also!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this injector because it was the only one that was stainless everywhere except the top cap and rings. Good quality! Very simple to use, and clean. Use this to inject my first smoked turkey. It was fantastic. With flavor throughout. Great product would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sue carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. My first non-plastic injector
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. My first non-plastic injector. Took a bit to get used to all the extra holes in the needle. I injected a pork roast Sunday and after 5 hours in my smoker the roast was still juicy when I cut into it. I expect to get many years of use out of this injector.
customer_reviews.author: tx3653

customer_reviews.title: Makes food taste better!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it twice. For thicker marinade on chicken. It's very easy to use. Make sure you oiled the ring inside the barrel before each use to ensure a smooth shot. Otherwise, you'll be fighting with the damn thing. Disassemble and throw it in the dishwasher. Done!
customer_reviews.author: ThuyM

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Its seems to be a high quality unit
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Its seems to be a high quality unit. I used it to inject brine into home made bacon and pork shoulder. Cuts down on brining time. Also got a nice email from the company. Make sure to read and follow the directions and it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jek

customer_reviews.title: Meat Injector
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered on time, was as described. Overall, I like the product, especially the weight of the injector; however, the plunger is a bit stiff when siphoning and injecting. It is possible that with continuous use it will slide easier. I will update my review after using for a few more times.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: A well made product that adds so much flavor to grilled foods. All components are made of stainless steel and are solid. Easy to assemble, change attachment and clean. A winner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: especially like the needle tip that has several holes on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far, but it's very well built and the seals appear tight and strong. especially like the needle tip that has several holes on the sides instead of one at the point. No need to withdraw the syringe slowly as you inject and the tip on my last injector would get clogged with meat as you pierced the meat and would need to be cleaned out every time you filled it. Very happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baird

customer_reviews.title: Super Value for Sturdy Injector.
customer_reviews.text: What a great bargain this turkey injector is. I had bought a plastic one for $3.00 less than this one. It broke within a few days. Then the replacement broke. This is a sturdy injector that comes with two different types of needles. It even comes with extra O rings. if you ever lose the seal. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for injecting flavors / marinades into meat Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ozarks Hermit

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with vendor and product
customer_reviews.text: Highly responsive vendor, product meets expectations as advertised. Great follow up leaving a high confidence for support and assurance of success. I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: nanaskds

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm learning how to marinade. It's easy to use. Just make sure to oil the inside like they recommend, so it will be easier to push the plunger. I got a long way to go to be a pro.
customer_reviews.author: C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot and was impressed by the company's ...
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old injector which I've had for years. I read the reviews and decided on this one. I like it a lot and was impressed by the company's interest for my satisfaction. I am happy to say that for the price it's well worth it. I would purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service and well made injector.
customer_reviews.text: The package was very hard to open, but the injector is very well made and easy to use, have a feeling I am going to be doing a lot of injecting and trying new recipes. Can not ask for better customer service either.
customer_reviews.author: rehabber

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple, but high quality meat injector. Even when I accidently put it through the dishwasher no issues the rubber held up, etc. I recommend this to everyone wanting a meat injector.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: This injector has seen about 8 cooks now and is very easy to take apart and clean
customer_reviews.text: This meat injector is top notch. After using a plastic one for years we decided to give a stainless steel one a try. The only meat flavor injector will not let you down for this price. Owning a Big Green Egg we do weekly smoking cooks. This injector has seen about 8 cooks now and is very easy to take apart and clean. It comes with extra o rings. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Fineout

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed with the quality and the promptness ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality and the promptness of delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and upon initial inspection it is high quality. The injector body is hefty, which in my opinion is good. I have not tried this out yet...need to buy some chickens today! All the components feel good and I love that it is stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Great, high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this injector is top notch. The stainless steel construction, the various size needles provided for different injections and extra silicon O-rings seals. The e-book that is sent iwth it has great tips and ideas as well. Outstanding value.
customer_reviews.author: Giulio DiCicco

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality, heavy-duty product; easy to operate and use (be sure to follow the initial startup and after use instructions); supplied needles enable using a multitude of marinade ingredients. Excellent proactive customer service to ensure prompt delivery, as well as, customer and product satisfaction. I am very pleased with this product and, especially, the attentive customer service.

product_meta.title: Premiala Awesome Meat Injector - The Original Turkey Injector Creates The Juiciest Turkey and BBQ Ever! 3 Needles + Cleaning Brushes + 100% Food-Grade Materials = Guaranteed to Keep Your Family Safe!
feature_bullets: 👍 100% FOOD-SAFE! - Unlike the competition, Premiala’s heavy duty seasoning injector is 100% ALUMINUM-FREE! Only Premiala uses 100% food-safe 304-grade stainless steel for every component which touches the marinade. Guaranteed to keep your family safe!

🥩🍗🥩 TENDERIZES ALL CUTS OF MEAT! With THREE precision needles, you can let your creativity flow! The long 6” needles (12-hole version for liquids, single-hole version for purees) are perfect for whole chicken or turkey, or for roast beef, pork or lamb; while the 3" steak needle is just the right thickness for juicifying minute steaks, kebabs or schnitzels!

🌏 REDUCES WASTE! Unlike the cheap injectors you have to keep throwing away, the Premiala Food Syringe is built from long-lasting materials that won't rust or corrode. It also comes with 5 spare o-rings, and we sell replacement needles and o-rings if you ever lose a part! Invest in our future with a product that lasts longer! 🚯

💦 DISCOVER A NEW WORLD OF FLAVORS! Premiala’s marinade injector includes a free download of our "Flavor Injector Secrets and Recipes" e-book! Not only does it simply explain how to fill and use your bbq injector, it also gives a whole range of new marinades to explore for different types of meat, and explains how marinades work and reveals the SECRET FORMULA FOR A SUCCESSFUL MARINADE you can use to create your own marinades!

🎁GORGEOUSLY GIFT BOXED! Keep all the accessories together in the included premium flip-top storage box so you can easily find what you're looking for! It makes the perfect gift for men or other BBQ lovers! Plus, join our VIP club and upgrade the 12 month warranty to a lifetime warranty! There's simply no reason not to invest in the best!
